hero.role: QA Specialist | Master Brewer | Beekeeper | Welder | Bread Maker | Father & Husband

qa.title: QA Automation Framework
qa.desc: A robust end-to-end testing suite built for high-traffic eCommerce platforms. Reduced regression testing time by 60% and caught critical payment gateway bugs before production.

brewing.title: SYI Professional Brewing Kit
brewing.desc: Designed and built a custom semi-automated brewing system. Features temperature control, magnetic drive pumps, and a capacity of 50L per batch.

wedding.title: Wedding Gates & Decor
wedding.desc: Handcrafted hexagonal wedding arches and rustic decor. Old-fashioned electrode welding, woodworking, and structural design for client events.

house.title: The House Rebuild
house.desc: Complete renovation of a 1970s Austrian Hunter-style home. Installed floor heating, modernized insulation, and preserved the classic aesthetic.

beekeeping.title: The Apiary
beekeeping.desc: Managing beehives with traditional and modern methods. Honey extraction, bee health monitoring, and sustainable beekeeping practices.

breadmaking.title: Artisan Sourdough
breadmaking.desc: Mastering the art of fermentation. Natural sourdough starters, long fermentation cycles, and the pursuit of the perfect crust.
